extendedInfo.description: ICC Cricket World Cup 2015Host: Australia & New Zealand.Matches starts in February 2015.14 teams are participating in this tournament same as 2011 World Cup.Format is the same as 2011 edition.India, Australia, England, New Zealand, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh, West Indies, Pakistan, Zimbabwe, South Africa, Ireland etc.. Final of the tournament will take place in Melbourne Cricket Ground.Each and every moment is shown in this application.Live Streaming, Schedule, Teams, Days Remaining, Notifications on the match day,  Introducing new types of buttons, About Grounds, About Teams, Videos, Live Commentary,  official website, etc.Tags: icc, icc cricket, world cup. world cup 2015, count down, icc cricket world cup 2015, icc cricket world cup 2015 schedule, schedule, odi, one day international, icc worldcup live streaming.Required things will be updated soon.Any request/errors please mail to my mail id.
